outputs.name: mesh
outputs.description: A colored mesh for the legend colors.

outputs.name: title_obj
outputs.description: A text object for the  legend title.

outputs.name: label_objs
outputs.description: An array of text objects for the label text.

outputs.name: label_text
outputs.description: An array of text strings for the label text.

outputs.name: colors
outputs.description:
An array of colors that align with the input _values. This can
be used to color geometry that aligns with the values.

inputs.name: _values
inputs.description:
A list of numerical data that the legend refers to (or just the
minimum and maximum numerical values of this data).  If the original
numerical data is hooked up, the legend's maximum and minimum values
will be set by the max and min of the data set.

inputs.name: _base_plane_
inputs.description:
An optional plane or point to set the location of the
legend. (Default: Rhino origin - (0, 0, 0))

inputs.name: title_
inputs.description:
A text string representing a legend title. Legends are usually
titled with the units of the data.

inputs.name: legend_par_
inputs.description: Optional legend parameters from the  Legend Parameters component.

code:
try:
    from ladybug.legend import Legend, LegendParameters
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.togeometry import to_plane
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.fromobjects import legend_objects
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.color import color_to_color
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # set default values
    legend_par_ = legend_par_.duplicate() if legend_par_ is not None else \
        LegendParameters()
    if _base_plane_:
        legend_par_.base_plane = to_plane(_base_plane_)
    legend_par_.title = title_

    # create the legend
    legend = Legend(_values, legend_par_)

    # separate all of the outputs from this component
    {{cad}}_objs = legend_objects(legend)
    mesh = {{cad}}_objs[0]
    title_obj = {{cad}}_objs[1]
    label_objs = {{cad}}_objs[2:]
    label_text = legend.segment_text
    colors = [color_to_color(col) for col in legend.value_colors]
name: LB Create Legend
description:
Create a custom legend for any set of data or range. Creating a legend with this
component allows for a bit more flexibility than what can be achieved by working
with the legends automatically output from different studies.
